title: Looking for Piedmont Backs (Graded 5+ or Raw Ex+)
author: Mantle77CA

posts.post_title: Looking for Piedmont Backs (Graded 5+ or Raw Ex+)
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone.  Getting back into the hobby here and new to the forum.  I’m focusing on T206 Piedmont backs that are 5 range and higher (or raw in Ex or higher).  As far as grading company, I’m open.  If it’s a more obscure grading company and the card is obviously altered, I’m not interested :D

Anyhow, if you have any cards that fit the bill, feel free to contact me.  I have a high eBay rating that I can use as a reference if necessary since I’m new here.
